channel.title: Help with two things
channel.description: first thing that i need help with is the divine pk source i would like to know how i can edit the tags that show up so that they will be of my own. if you dont know what i mean by tags im talking about the command window having my server name on it and the client having it too any help would be greatly appreciated. and my next question would be with the easy rsc server how do i make my self admin lol?
